item.title: Send Message Or SendFrame
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:

isnt it sendFrame126(“TEXT”);??? isnt it? eg
case 150:
sendFrame126(“Hey”);
break;
is tht rite[br][size=1]Posted on: July 15, 2007, 10:39:07 AM[/size][hr]ok mistake it is case 185[br][size=1]Posted on: July 15, 2007, 10:47:04 AM[/size][hr]ok i have this:[br][size=1]Posted on: July 15, 2007, 10:49:25 AM[/size][hr]ok i have this:

case 185: //clicking most buttons actionButtonId = misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffer, 0, packetSize); if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("007 Pkerz")) println_debug("Case 185: "+actionButtonId); switch(actionButtonId) {

item.title: Send Message Or SendFrame
item.dc:creator: @i_own_pking i_own_pking
item.description:
@i_own_pking wrote:

Goneby123:

ok so i wanted to edit the auto retaliate off buttom (case : 150) and i was wondering to put txt wat do i do? sendFrame? or something? idk…help please[br][size=1]Posted on: July 15, 2007, 09:52:45 AM[/size][hr]is there like diff frames? because tht would be hard to figure out

sendFrame126 but youll need to find the place to put the text

sendMessage is for game messages like ::yell
